channel.title: BareBones on GetToKnow
channel.description: Recent content in BareBones on GetToKnow

item.title: BasicsOfBasics_OsDev
item.description: Introduction: In a journey to understand how Operating systems works, I'll do an attempt of making a minimalistic operating system. This is the first blog that will discuss the main steps I followed to have it at this state. And also provide All resources I've used. Resources: OsDevWiki EMPTY EMPTY EMPTY STEPS: Building a Cross-Compiler
